featured.text: According to the legend, notes of 33 plans for a revolution to overthrow the Mongols were hidden in mooncakes that would ordinarily have been stuffed with sweet bean paste.

definition.zh_def: 將一種物質（如膠水或黏合劑）塗抹或附著於另一物體上，或將文本或圖像從一個地方轉移到另一個地方。
definition.en_def: To attach or stick one substance to another, or to transfer text or images from one place to another.
definition.example: Please paste the document into the folder.
